ComicInfo.Summary:
THE FALL OF THE HAMMER PART 2
The X-Men of 2099 pay Ravage a visit. What will lead the X-Men to the hallowed halls of Valhalla? And will they uncover the truth about missing scientist Jordan Boone? Ravage may have the answer to this question and more!
Ravage's friend Tiana has been conned into being part of a false Norse God pantheon. To make things worse, the floating city they are headquartered on is destined to fall out of the sky.

ComicInfo.Title: Horns of a Dilemma
